text: I don't know if you guys have seen the

but we featured a beautiful and fresh

our cover and there are three other
variations in the magazine really really
simple straightforward recipes that you
can make with cooked chicken and chicken
broth and they come together in minutes
today I'm gonna make one of those
recipes
it's a ginger and garlic chicken soup
could not be easier start off with one
clove of sliced garlic
you're gonna saute that in just a tiny
bit of oil teaspoon of oil add that to
the pan and then a teaspoon of grated
ginger I'm just gonna grate it right
over the pot using my rasp grater it's
already peeled you can add more if you
want to maybe that was a bad idea
my hand is burning I'm coming back to
the board sometimes you make snap
decisions that are not the right
decision
haha luckily there is going back in this

turmeric saute that just until fragrant
and in fact the garlic is already
smelling fragrant so to that I'm gonna
add my broth it's six cups of low-sodium

homemade I love homemade and every time
I make a roast chicken I use the carcass
to make stock or you can buy bones to
make stock but there are lots of good
brands out there that you can buy and
they're quite delicious
just look for low-sodium otherwise it's

we're just waiting so it's boiling now

the pots kind of small it's also easier

doesn't look quite as elegant but I

you can use rotisserie chicken you can
